SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
NONPROFIT CLOUD CASE MANAGEMENT DOCUMENTATION
Configure Client Management

Customize the client card, client notes, referrals, incidents, and more.

Customize the Client Card
The Client Card displays at the top of a Contact record and shows all of the most important information about a Contact, including name, a photo, contact information, critical alerts, and Client ID.
Configure Client Notes
Customize Client Note fields, display fields based on record types, and maintain client note relationships.
Configure Support for Household Accounts
If your organization uses Case Management to deliver case management support and program benefits to a household (for example, a food bank), update the Case Management Case Plans and Client Notes so that you see the Household Account as the beneficiary of the services delivered.
Create Household Account Record Type
If you use Case Management in an org without NPSP, you need to create an Account record type for Household Account.
Configure Referrals
The Referrals feature was released in Case Management version 1.14 (8/18/2020). If you started using Case Management before that date, or if the feature isn't configured in your org, complete these required set up steps.
Configure Intakes
Customize and use Intakes for the nonprofit Case Management managed package.
Customize Incidents
Create custom fields to display on the Incident component on a Contact record.
Customize Assessments
Customize assessment scores and create multiple assessment types.
Customize Case Plan Goals and Action Items
Customize the Goal and Action Item fields on a Case Plan.
Configure Goal and Action Item Templates
Add fields about templates to page layouts.
